PLAHIS Planning Application Reference: TREE2025/00046--- Address: 11 Park HillCarshaltonSM5 3RS--- Proposal: Reason for Works:Routine maintenance ? crown lifting and thinningDescription of Works:I am applying for consent to carry out crown lifting and selective thinning of two trees protected by a Tree Preservation Order (Yew T1 and T2). The purpose of the work is to maintain the health and structure of the tree, and to prevent overhanging branches from encroaching further onto my property roof.The branches currently overhang the roof of my property and pose a risk of:1.Accumulation of leaves and debris in gutters, leading to drainage issues2.Restricted air flow and light to the roof surface, potentially promoting moss growth and dampThe proposed work will involve:1.Crown lifting to achieve a clearance of approximately 2?3 metres above the roofline2.Selective thinning of the canopy by no more than 20% to reduce density and allow light penetration, while preserving the tree?s natural shapeAll work will be carried out in accordance with BS 3998:2010 ? Tree Work Recommendations, by a qualified and insured tree surgeon.Additional Works for mixed trees (Conservation Area):In addition, I would like to carry out trimming and maintenance of all mixed species trees and shrubs located at the front and side garden. Although these trees are not individually protected by a TPO, the property lies within a conservation area, and I understand that consent is required before undertaking any work on them.These trees and shrubs have become overgrown, causing obstruction to the public pedestrian pathway and significantly blocking natural sunlight to the front of my property. I propose to reduce them to a manageable size while maintaining their health and appearance.--- Status: INV--- Decision: --- Date Decision Issued: ---
CONARE Conservation Area: PARK HILL CA

description: T1 - Yew Tree - Crown lift to provide 3m from roofline and crown thin by 20%.T2 - Yew Tree - Crown lift to provide 3m from roofline and crown thin by 20%.T3 - Crown reduction by 2m.T4 - Crown reduction by 2m.T5 - Crown thin by 20%.T6 - Crown thin by 20%.T7 - Crown thin by 20%.
